name: Verso Corporation
description: Verso Corporation is a leading producer of coated and uncoated freesheet and specialty papers, as well as a variety of paperboard products. Established in 2006, the company has its headquarters in Memphis, Tennessee, and operates manufacturing facilities in several locations across the United States. Verso is committed to providing high-quality products that meet the demands of its diverse customer base, which includes industries such as commercial printing, publishing, and packaging. The company prides itself on its sustainability initiatives, focusing on responsible forestry practices and the reduction of environmental impact throughout its production processes. With a strong emphasis on innovation and customer service, Verso continues to adapt to the evolving needs of the market, investing in advanced technologies and processes to enhance its product offerings. Verso's extensive portfolio includes well-known brands that are recognized for their quality and performance. The company is also dedicated to maintaining strong relationships with its suppliers and customers, ensuring a reliable supply chain and superior service. As the paper and packaging industry faces challenges from digital alternatives, Verso strives to leverage its expertise to remain competitive, while promoting the sustainable use of paper products as part of a circular economy.

key_executives.name: Michael A. R. V. V. D. G. S. W. R. W. H. L. C. O. L. R. M. H. K.

seo.meta_title: Verso Corporation | Leading Producer of Paper and Paperboard Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Verso Corporation, a top manufacturer of coated and uncoated freesheet papers and paperboard products. Discover our commitment to sustainability and innovation.

faq.question: What products does Verso Corporation offer?
faq.answer: Verso Corporation offers coated and uncoated freesheet papers, specialty papers, and paperboard products.

faq.question: Where is Verso Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: Verso Corporation is headquartered in Memphis, Tennessee, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Verso Corporation?
faq.answer: B. Christopher DiGiorgio is the CEO of Verso Corporation.
